attributes.action: Revise Policy on Arms Length Management Organisations and Return Control of Community Housing to Local Councils
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The undersigned ask the Government to Revise Policy on Arms Length Management Organisations and Return Control of Community Housing to Local Councils.
This petition is organised to disband ALMOs like Your Homes Newcastle. The reasons are below;
1 No local accountability and residents not fully consulted about decisions.
2 Complaints procedure ineffective.
3 Vulnerable members of the community are not treated properly.
4 Level of housing improvements just reaches low minimum standards.
5 Double-glazing not fitted to all community housing, in a Carbon Neutral City.
6 Local political parties unable or unwilling to challenge the management of these ALMO organisations.
To make a difference to housing standards in Newcastle as a resident, friend, relative or tax-payer who has been affected, every signature will help. You can also contact your MP indicated below; Thank you.
Jim Cousins MP Doug Henderson MP Rt Hon Nick Brown MP and Dave Clelland MP
